constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 197 (Friday, November 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. MILLER-MEEKS:
H.R. 5959.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S.C.
[Page H6247]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: CHOICE Act
